name: Biomni: Analyze Copy Number, Purity, Ploidy and Focal Events
description: Perform comprehensive copy number variation (CNV) analysis, estimate tumor purity and ploidy, and detect focal amplification/deletion events in cancer samples. Provides insights into genomic instability and oncogenic drivers.

tumor_bam.description: Path to the tumor sample BAM file

reference_genome.description: Path to the reference genome FASTA file

normal_bam.description: Path to the matched normal sample BAM file (optional)

output.description: Research log summarizing the copy number analysis, purity/ploidy estimates, and focal events detected

author: Biomni
